CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("http://singularpayments.com/solutionreach-enrollment-form?" & "Business_Legal_Name=" & Name & "&" & "DBA=" & Name & "&" & "Website=" & Website & "&" & "Address1=" & BillingStreet & "&" & "City=" & BillingCity & "&" & "State=" & BillingState & "&" & "Zip=" & BillingPostalCode & "&" & "Phone=" & Phone & "&" & "First_Name=" & Office_Contact__r.FirstName & "&" & "Last_Name=" & Office_Contact__r.LastName & "&" & "Title=" & Office_Contact__r.Title & "&" & "Contact_Phone=" & Office_Contact__r.Phone & "&" & "Email=" & Office_Contact__r.Email & "&" & "Email_Confirm=" & Office_Contact__r.Email, "Singular Payments Signup Link")
CustomField.label: Singular Signup Link
